name: U.D.C. (Universal Dominion Competition) - Gideon Games Inc.
blurb: New 2D Fighter Playable online vs. friends.

rewards.reward: Free Game download and \r\nSpecial Thanks on our website.

•  Special thanks on our website www.GideonGames.com - Deliverable Dec 2012. 
•   UDC Theme song download from Game soundtrack - Deliverable Feb 2013
•  1 free game download
•   UDC wall paper theme for desktop. - Deliverable July 2013.

\u2022 Special thanks on our website www.GideonGames.com - Deliverable Dec 2012. \u2022 UDC Theme song download from Game soundtrack - Deliverable Feb 2013 \u2022 1 free game download \u2022 UDC wall paper theme for desktop. - Deliverable July 2013.\u2022 Silver access to Development team forums.  Give your opinions about what you want to see in the game and any ideas used will get credited as part of the development team in the game credits. \u2022 UDC Badge (Pin).
